content:
US President Joe Biden emphasized the need to take care of Ukraine, which is fighting against Russian invaders, led by Putin's meatball.

He stated this duringspeechin North Carolina, USA, March 26, 2024.

In particular, Joe Biden emphasized the need for US Congress to finally make a decision to assist Ukraine.

"We could do so many things, including to finally protect Ukraine from Putin's butcher," the US President said.

These words disrupted the applause of the public.

As reported by the Armyinform, earlier Joe Bidenstatedthat Ukraine's protection is the main achievement of the United States in 2023.
title: Joe Biden spoke about the help of Ukraine and called Putin a butcher
description: He stated this during a speech in North Carolina, USA, March 26, 2024. ...
author: Army Inform
